definition: not to be inferior in any aspects (idiom)/to surpass/to outdo/(derog.) to be even worse
pinyin: you3 guo4 zhi1 er2 wu2 bu4 ji2

definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)

sentences.english: Look at what you are doing now. You are much worse than your father.
sentences.chinese: 看你现在做的呢，有过之而无不及。

sentences.english: The sting of jealousy is even worse than the sting of a bee.
sentences.chinese: 嫉妒的刺痛比蜜蜂蜇伤的痛有过之而无不及。

definition: lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom)/fig. not to be outdone/not to yield to one's opponents
inferior/not up to par/to fall far short/to be mistaken
lit. minor magician in the presence of a great one (idiom)/fig. to pale into insignificance by comparison
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: accurate to perfection (idiom)/precise to the finest detail
fall short by a large amount
inferior (often in the combination 毫無遜色|毫无逊色, not in the least inferior)
